sentences.en: An aerial thrust up from the grass verge.
sentences.cn: 一根天线在草地边上竖立着。

sentences.en: Carole was on the verge of tears.
He told us point - blank that his company was on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 他直截了当地告诉我们,他的公司快要破产了.

sentences.en: Her eyelids drooped as if she were on the verge of sleep.
sentences.cn: 她眼睑低垂好像快要睡着的样子.

sentences.en: Her parents are rumoured to be on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.cn: 据说她的父母快要离婚了。

sentences.en: His love of James Dean movies verged on fanaticism.
sentences.cn: 他对詹姆斯·迪恩影片的喜爱近乎狂热。

sentences.en: His voice trembled, on the verge of tears.
sentences.cn: 他声音颤抖，泪水在眼眶里打转。

sentences.en: I was on the verge of accepting.
I'm sad that Julie'smarriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.cn: 朱莉的婚姻濒临破裂，我为此感到难过。

sentences.en: Many species have been shot to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 很多物种已经被猎杀到灭绝的边缘。

sentences.en: She was on the verge of bursting into tears.
The animals were ruthlessly hunted to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 这些动物由于遭到无情的捕猎而濒于灭绝.

sentences.en: The big Irishman was on the verge of losing his cool.
sentences.cn: 那个高大的爱尔兰人快要失去冷静了。

sentences.en: The car skidded across the road and came to a stop on the grass verge.
sentences.cn: 汽车滑过路面，在路缘草带上停了下来。

sentences.en: The company is on the verge of insolvency.
The mystic token alighted on the hither verge of the stream.
sentences.cn: 那神秘的标志落在离小溪不远的地方.

sentences.en: The tycoon is on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 那名大亨濒临破产的边缘.

sentences.en: They set up camp on the verge of the desert.
sentences.cn: 他们在沙漠边缘扎下了营地。

trans.tran_cn: 边，边缘，界限，范围，起始点
trans.tran_en: the edge of a road, path etc
